mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN A.AM_CNT > 0 THEN ROUND(A.AM_LMT_AM / A.AM_CNT , 0) ELSE 0 END AS AM_EVE_LMT_AM /* 암-응찰하한가평균 */ , CASE WHEN A.AM_SBID_CNT > 0 THEN ROUND(A.AM_SBID_AM / A.AM_SBID_CNT, 0) ELSE 0 END AS AM_EVE_SBID_AM /* 암-낙찰가평균 */ , CASE WHEN A.SU_CNT > 0 THEN ROUND(A.SU_LMT_AM / A.SU_CNT , 0) ELSE 0 END AS SU_EVE_LMT_AM /* 수-응찰하한가평균 */ , CASE WHEN A.SU_SBID_CNT > 0 THEN ROUND(A.SU_SBID_AM / A.SU_SBID_CNT, 0) ELSE 0 END AS SU_EVE_SBID_AM /* 수-낙찰가평균 */ FROM (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AM_CNT /* 암-출장우 수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C = '1' THEN A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM ELSE 0 END) AS AM_LMT_AM /* 암-응찰하한가 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C = '1' AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AM_SBID_CNT /* 암-낙찰우 수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C = '1' AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS AM_SBID_AM /* 암-낙찰가 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C != '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SU_CNT /* 수-출장우 수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C != '1' THEN A.LOWS_SBID_LMT_AM ELSE 0 END) AS SU_LMT_AM /* 수-응찰하한가 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C != '1' AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS SU_SBID_CNT /* 수-낙찰우 수 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN B.INDV_SEX_C != '1' AND A.SEL_STS_DSC = '22' THEN A.SRA_SBID_AM ELSE 0 END) AS SU_SBID_AM /* 수-낙찰가 */ FROM TB_LA_IS_MH_SOG_COW A , TB_LA_IS_MM_INDV B WHERE A.NA_BZPLC = #{ss_na_bzplc} AND A.AUC_OBJ_DSC = CASE WHEN #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} = '0' THEN A.AUC_OBJ_DSC ELSE #{cb_auc_obj_dsc} END AND A.AUC_DT = #{auc_dt} AND A.LED_SQNO = 1 AND A.DEL_YN = '0' /* 삭제건이 아닌건 */ AND A.NA_BZPLC = B.NA_BZPLC AND A.SRA_INDV_AMNNO = B.SRA_INDV_AMNNO AND A.SRA_SRS_DSC = B.SRA_SRS_DSC ) A
